description: Decimal expansion of sine of 87 degrees.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Raimundas Vidunas, Expressions for values of the gamma function, math.CA/0403510
formula: Equals cos(Pi/60) = [5-sqrt(5)]*[1+sqrt(3)]*[2-sqrt(3)+sqrt{5+2*sqrt(5)}]/[8*sqrt(10)] = sqrt[(1+A019893)/2]. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 18 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
